channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2025010858
item.description:
Report X-2025010858

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY SIX POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING COLD CASE ICE CREAM. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM UTAH USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER E3837J, CC ICE CREAM GROUND, 649 N 1500 W, OREM UT 84057-2831.

item.title: Report X-2025010685
item.description:
Report X-2025010685

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-11
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT BACK TO CLERK AREA AND UPON OPENING IT WAS FOUND THAT ONE OF THE 4L BOTTLES HAD SHATTERED AND SPILLED. THE SHIPPING PAPERS SIGNATURE AND DATE DESTROYED AS WELL AS THE ORIGINAL LABEL. ALL CONTENTS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.
